message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250? This considers both our valuations.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that number. How about we try $12,800? I'm willing to compromise, but I don't want to go too far above my budget.
